name: startSilex
body:
Equipped and configured with ==========
  • Twig
  • Doctrine DBAL
  • Symfony Form
  • Symfony Dependency Injection
  • Symfony YAML Config
  • Web Profiler
  • Routes as controllers
  • Class as services
  • Monolog
  • PHPUnit ready (see tests/)
  • CORS Ready
Install ========== You only need to run composer install and that's all folks!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
